item.title: Trying PHPlot
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description: PHPlot looks better than Perl’s GD::Graph … I don’t know how to exactly describe the difference, but feel like: neat, easy to understand, easy to control, and better default values. I’m migrating some BI sites to PHPlot so to get rid of Perl stuffs, so to make things purely PHP based, thus other PHP guys [...]
item.content:encoded:
PHPlot looks better than Perl’s GD::Graph … I don’t know how to exactly describe the difference, but feel like: neat, easy to understand, easy to control, and better default values.

I’m migrating some BI sites to PHPlot so to get rid of Perl stuffs, so to make things purely PHP based, thus other PHP guys can take over it easily.
